00070 class SIM_API cObject
00071 {
00072     friend class cOwnedObject;
00073     friend class cDefaultList;
00074 
00075   public:
00076     // internal: returns a descriptor object for this object
00077     virtual cClassDescriptor *getDescriptor();
00078 
00079   protected:
00080     // internal
00081     virtual void ownedObjectDeleted(cOwnedObject *obj);
00082 
00083     // internal
00084     virtual void yieldOwnership(cOwnedObject *obj, cObject *to);
00085 
00086   public:
00091     cObject() {}
00092 
00098     virtual ~cObject();
00099 
00105     virtual const char *getClassName() const;
00106 
00113     virtual const char *getName() const  {return "";}
00114 
00118     bool isName(const char *s) const {return !opp_strcmp(getName(),s);}
00119 
00128     virtual const char *getFullName() const  {return getName();}
00129 
00137     virtual std::string getFullPath() const;
00138 
00148     virtual std::string info() const;
00149 
00156     virtual std::string detailedInfo() const;
00157 
00163     virtual cObject *dup() const;
00165 
00166   protected:
00174 
00182     virtual void take(cOwnedObject *obj);
00183 
00192     virtual void drop(cOwnedObject *obj);
00193 
00207     void dropAndDelete(cOwnedObject *obj);
00209 
00210   public:
00221     virtual void parsimPack(cCommBuffer *buffer);
00222 
00226     virtual void parsimUnpack(cCommBuffer *buffer);
00228 
00235     virtual cObject *getOwner() const {return NULL;}
00236 
00244     virtual bool isOwnedObject() const {return false;}
00245 
00254     virtual void forEachChild(cVisitor *v);
00255 
00268     cObject *findObject(const char *name, bool deep=true);
00270 
00279     void copyNotSupported() const;
00281 };

00302 class noncopyable
00303 {
00304   protected:
00305     noncopyable() {}
00306     ~noncopyable() {}
00307   private:
00308     // private, and in addition unimplemented (usage causes missing linker symbol)
00309     noncopyable(const noncopyable& x);
00310     const noncopyable& operator=(const noncopyable&);
00311 };
